definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to walk (side part of split character)
to go the wrong way/to go against one-way traffic regulation
to go against the wind/contrary wind/a headwind
against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
to sail against the current/(fig.) to go against the flow

sentences.english: Why can't we always say the solution is X = A inverse B?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼“解爲X=A逆，B”不總是正確？

sentences.english: In the second chapter, the forward scattering series methods have been deducted.
sentences.chinese: 第二章推導了逆散射級數法的正演過程。

sentences.english: If AX=B, then let's multiply both sides by A inverse.
sentences.chinese: 如果AX=B，在等號兩邊同時乘以A逆。

sentences.english: The south Qinling has formed an imbricated thrust fault at low angle from the north to the south.
sentences.chinese: 南秦嶺自北向南產生低角度疊瓦狀逆沖斷裂。

sentences.english: A method is proposed for the inverse displacement analysis of the dual double-octahedral variable geometry truss manipulators.
sentences.chinese: 研究了雙二重八面體變幾何桁架機器人的逆位置分析。

sentences.english: The control of settlement difference is a key technology of up-side-down construction adopted for soft soil foundation.
sentences.chinese: 沉降差控制是軟土地區逆作法施工中的關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Finally, we simply talk about the application and development of inverse eigenvalue problem.
sentences.chinese: 最後，淺談了矩陣逆特徵值問題的應用。

sentences.english: The catalysis of lipase in reversed micelles systems was showed in this review.
sentences.chinese: 該綜述對逆膠束系統脂肪酶的催化作了較詳細的敘述。

sentences.english: This paper analysis the counter possible existence, untie and have no to untie condition.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析並討論了求逆可能存在的多解和無解情況。

sentences.english: Pls. cut all jacket agai t hair.
We use a new deblurring function that is easier to implement than inverse filter.
sentences.chinese: 採用了新的消模糊函數，它比起逆濾波器較易於製作。

sentences.english: You should know what an orthonormal matrix is and a shortcut to compute its inverse.
sentences.chinese: 你應該知道什麼是正交矩陣以及求它的逆的簡單方法。

sentences.english: The austenite in the steel after aging is mainly reverted austenite.
sentences.chinese: 時效態鋼中奧氏體主要爲逆轉變奧氏體。

sentences.english: Many years ago are throwing over the time, go against the wind to pass through Yan Ranshan.
sentences.chinese: 多年前披着時間，逆着風走過燕然山。

sentences.english: We had to run against the wind.
And the weight from hide layer neuron to output layer neuron were determined to use pseudo-inverse method.
sentences.chinese: 利用僞逆方法確定隱層神經元到輸出神經元的權值。

definition: against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
to go the wrong way/to go against one-way traffic regulation
circular motion in the same sense as the sun/clockwise
see 矯枉過正|矫枉过正[jiao3 wang3 guo4 zheng4]
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble
tenth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/tenth in order/letter "J" or Roman "X" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 15°/deca
